testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I should be able to access the relevant announcement data by entering id through the API connection.
testcase.name: Invalid Token When sending a GET body with invalid authorization information to the /api/getNoticeById

failure.message: expected:<status code: 403, reason phrase: Forbidden> but was:<null>

testcase.failure:

testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to create a new announcement record via API connection.
testcase.name: The creation of the new announcement record to be created through the API must be verified through the API.
